Container.Name: owncloud
Container.Description: ownCloud gives you universal access to your files through a web interface or WebDAV. It also provides a platform to easily view and sync your contacts, calendars and bookmarks across all your devices and enables basic editing right on the web.
Container.Overview:
ownCloud gives you universal access to your files through a web interface or WebDAV. It also provides a platform to easily view and sync your contacts, calendars and bookmarks across all your devices and enables basic editing right on the web.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/usr/share/webapps/owncloud/data[/b] : this path is where ownCloud data is stored.[br][br] [b]/usr/share/webapps/owncloud/config[/b] : this path is where ownCloud config is stored.[br][br] [b]/https[/b] : this path is where ownCloud https ssl certificates are stored.[br][br] [b] This docker works well well with an apache reverse proxy for access to the outside world[/b][br]
Connect to http://[IP]:8000/owncloud if https is [b]not[/b] enabled[br] Connect to https://[IP]:8443/owncloud if https [b]is[/b] enabled[br]
